page.title: 06 Farm Machinery
page.content: Mechanisation on the farm is now indispensible to the farmer aiding productivity by its efficient usage, at the same time representing high capital cost in place of reduced labour costs.The tractor is regarded as the generel purpose vehicle.On the 4 farms surveyed,there were Ford (13),Massey Ferguson(12)and International Harvester(1).Total 26. Parks Farm has one tractor per 104 acres,Chelmshoe one tractor per 92 acres and Lucking and Moat Farms one per 76 acres.The farms keep their tractors between 6 and 11 years.Each farm has its own Combine Harvester, ranging from 80 to 200+ horsepower. Other machinery of interest identified were a Standen 3 row trailed beet harvester, a Bobcat steer loader and two forklift trucks.
